name: 希瑟·沃奎斯特 Heather Wahlquist
intro: Heather Wahlquist (born May 23, 1977) is an American film and television actress. She is married to director/writer Nick Cassavetes and has appeared in several of his films. Wahlquist was raised in Oklahoma, where she graduated from Seminole High School and studied psychology for two years at the University of Oklahoma.She is the co-writer, with Cassavettes, of the motion picture Yellow, filming in 2011 and starring Wahlquist as a woman who returns to her native Oklahoma after running into problems in her life in Los Angeles.
birthplace: 美国,俄克拉荷马州,俄克拉荷马城
